data.prayer: Spirit, guide someone in the church in the state of Lorestan to a person ready to receive the message of the gospel, like Lydia, and who will then open her home to faith.
data.verse: One of those listening was a woman from the city of Thyatira named Lydia, a dealer in purple cloth. She was a worshiper of God. The Lord opened her heart to respond to Paul’s message.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Lorestan, Iran
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, look after and teach the way that is best for the 9,172 believers living in Lorestan, Iran.
data.verse: I will instruct you and teach you in the way you should go. I will counsel you with my loving eye on you.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 191 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, see the suffering of your people in the state of Lorestan. Deliver all those who have not forgotten your Word.
data.verse: Look on my suffering and deliver me, for I have not forgotten your law.

data.prayer: Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the state of Lorestan, Iran.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Lord we ask you on behalf of the Sivandi people. 0.0% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.

Lord, we know that you invest more in those who have been faithful with what they have been given. Please, richly bless each faithful believer in Lorestan with more spiritual insight, wisdom, courage and vision.
data.verse: So take the bag of gold from him and give it to the one who has ten bags. For whoever has will be given more, and they will have an abundance. Whoever does not have, even what they have will be taken from them.

data.prayer: Father, it’s possible most of the 1,727,653 lost people in  Lorestan, Iran have never held or opened a Bible. Please change this, Father.
data.verse: Yet faith comes from listening to this Good News—the Good News about Christ.

data.prayer: Jesus, please give the apostles in Lorestan, Iran a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the state.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

location.name: Lorestan
